telefony_activation_add_line_intro: You can enable the telephone lines included in your pack.
telefony_activation_add_line_intro_multi: If you enable several telephone lines at once, you will only pay the port fee once.
telefony_activation_no_more_port_modem: No more lines available on the modem, a telephone is required
telefony_activation_an_error_ocurred: An error occurred while creating your line
telephony_activation_shipping_address_la: Choose the address and delivery mode for your telephone
telephony_activation_shipping_transporte: Delivery by courier (+ {{cost}}{{currency}} ex. VAT) within 24 hours (after sending)
telephony_activation_shipping_relay_labe: Free delivery by Mondial Relay within 48 hours (after sending)
telefony_activation_widget_free_slot_zer: You no longer have any available services
telefony_activation_widget_on_doing: You have one or more lines being enabled.
telefony_activation_widget_line_on_modem: Only one line can be enabled on the modem. For anything more than this, additional hardware will be necessary — and is provided with a deposit by OVHcloud.
telefony_activation_widget_lines_on_mode: Only {{linesOnModem}} lines can be enabled on the modem. For anything more than this, additional hardware will be necessary — and is provided with a deposit by OVHcloud.
telefony_activation_hardware_select_all_: Order this hardware for all lines
telephony_activation_order_error_global: Error [{{code}}] {{text}}: Please note that orders (line enabling) may be divided into several groups and sent independently. One order has failed, blocking others — but it may be the case that only part of these orders was confirmed beforehand. Please check the list below:
telephony_activation_order_resume: To access your purchase order, please click on the link below
telephony_activation_intro_multiline: If you enable several lines with telephones at the same time, you will only pay the port fee once. Only two lines can be enabled on the modem. For anything more than this, additional hardware will be necessary — and is provided with a deposit by OVHcloud.
telephony_activation_choice_intro: OVHcloud offers a selection of telephones with a deposit.
telephony_activation_choice_intro_2: You can order a telephone or fax for your line, or attach your line to existing multi-line hardware.
telephony_activation_choice_filter_price: Order from lowest to highest price
Order from highest to lowest price
telephony_activation_order_nb_select_pho: You have selected {{nbLines}} lines, please select {{nbLines}} products.
telephony_activation_choice_quantity_max: You have reached the maximum number of products, you cannot add more.
